page.title: 15Games in the playground
page.content: {Hide & seek:}A group of 5 or more can play. Someone goes "on" to catch the others.The person who is on counts to 500 while the others hide. When he has finished counting he shots " coming ready or not"If he sees someone he runs back and shouts"1,2,3 and their name".The first one to be caught waits by the base but, if the last person not caught can reach the base and shout "1,2,3 save all" then everyone escapes and have to be found again. { { Bulldogs }One person has to stop people trying to cross from one side of the yard to the other.If you are caught then you are also on.The game goes on till everyone is caught when they shout "bulldogs". Boys and girls can play Bulldogs {Penlarg C.P.
